channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Footways Slabs problem, 27th October
item.description:
Give and take plus temporary footway closure please replace x1 broken rocking 900x600x20mm slab number 2 (FW Broken Slabs)
